title: Salt and pepper chicken
ingredients: ['300g breaded boneless chicken', '4 tablespoons vegetable or sunflower oil', '1 to 2 onions, sliced', '1 green pepper, sliced', '4 to 5 cloves garlic, minced', '3 to 4 green and/or red chillies, sliced', 'coarse sea salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'good splash of rice wine vinegar']
